inclusion.criterion: children who have had at least one physician visit in the past year for abdominal pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: children with recurrent abdominal pain who meet the criteria for irritable bowel syndrome
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: children who have another disease that accounts for stomach pain
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin positive stool samples.
